abstract: The Financial Industry Regulatory Authority sanctioned Merrill Lynch for requiring former brokers to settle disputes over “retention bonuses” in New York State court instead of an authority arbitration panel.
snippet: The Financial Industry Regulatory Authority sanctioned Merrill Lynch for requiring former brokers to settle disputes over “retention bonuses” in New York State court instead of an authority arbitration panel.
lead_paragraph: The big bonuses doled out at Merrill Lynch during the height of the financial crisis have once again reared their ugly head.

headline.main: Merrill Lynch Fined $1 Million for Bonus Clawbacks
